words.def: the act of rearranging things to give a misleading impression
The sound made when a liquid is poured out of a jug or bottle.
cement consisting of a sticky substance that is used as an adhesive
a racing sled for one or two people
a large bottle with a narrow mouth
animal reproductive body consisting of an ovum or embryo together with nutritive and protective envelopes
a colloid in a more solid form than a sol
the basic unit of money in Moldova
angular distance above the horizon (especially of a celestial object)
